hero.title: Custom AI Platforms

hero.description: We build enterprise-grade automation systems and custom AI agents. From strategy to full-stack implementation, we help you scale without adding headcount.

features.sectionSubtitle: We don't just connect APIs ‚Äî we architect complete intelligent systems. Whether you need a custom platform or a complex workflow automation, we build it.

items.title: Custom AI Agents
items.description: We build autonomous agents tailored to your specific business logic. They handle complex decision-making tasks 24/7.

items.title: Enterprise Integrations
items.description: Deep integration with your existing stack: ERPs, CRMs, Financial systems. We handle legacy systems and modern APIs alike.

items.title: Operational Efficiency
items.description: Reduce manual overhead by 90%. We identify bottlenecks and deploy automated solutions that scale with your growth.

items.title: Platform & Consultancy
items.description: Use our self-serve platform for quick wins, or hire our consultancy for custom, full-stack enterprise builds.

items.title: PIPEDA Compliant
items.description: Canadian data residency. PIPEDA-compliant privacy policy. Enterprise security. Your data stays in Canada.

items.title: 50+ Pre-Built Templates
items.description: E-commerce automation, customer support, invoice processing, lead qualification. Industry-specific templates.

testimonials.sectionTitle: Why Systems Thinking Makes the Difference
testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Systems thinking is THE critical skill for the AI age. It's what makes you stand out in the job market, succeed in business, and achieve optimal outcomes. See how it's transforming businesses worldwide.

items.quote: AIAS Consultancy didn't just integrate TikTok‚Äîthey built us a complete platform that thinks and optimizes on its own. The custom AI agents they developed have transformed how we manage TikTok campaigns. This is exactly the kind of custom build that showcases their expertise.
items.author: Marketing Director

items.quote: AIAS Consultancy built us an entire automation ecosystem, not just integrations. Their custom AI agents understand our business logic and make decisions autonomously. It's like having a team of experts working 24/7. This showcases what AIAS Consultancy can build.
items.author: Operations Manager

items.quote: Systems thinking is what sets AIAS apart. They didn't just automate my processes ‚Äî they analyzed my entire system from multiple perspectives, found root causes, and designed a holistic solution. This is THE skill needed in the AI age, and it made all the difference.
items.author: Emma Chen

faq.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our consultancy services and custom AI platform development.

questions.question: What's the difference between AIAS Consultancy and AIAS Platform?
questions.answer: AIAS Platform is ready-to-use automation software. Our consultancy builds custom platforms from scratch.

questions.question: How long does it take to build a custom AI platform?
questions.answer: Typically 8-16 weeks. We provide weekly demos so you see progress every step of the way.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: Modern, scalable tech stacks tailored to your needs. We use Next.js, Node.js, Python, and leading AI frameworks.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Yes. We offer ongoing support including monitoring, optimization, and feature enhancements.

questions.question: What's included in a custom AI platform build?
questions.answer: Complete development from strategy to deployment: architecture, AI agents, analytics, infrastructure, security, training, and support.

questions.question: How much does a custom AI platform cost?
questions.answer: Custom projects range from $50K-$500K+ depending on scope. Schedule a strategy call for a custom quote.

questions.question: Can I try AIAS Platform before hiring consultancy services?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Start with our 30-day free trial. The platform is CAD $49/month for the Starter plan.

questions.question: Do you offer payment plans for consultancy projects?
questions.answer: Yes. We structure payments across project phases, aligning with deliverables.

questions.question: How do you ensure projects stay on time and budget?
questions.answer: We use agile methodology with weekly demos and clear milestones. Scope is locked after discovery.

questions.question: What if I need changes during development?
questions.answer: We accommodate changes through formal change requests. Minor adjustments are usually included.

questions.question: Will my team be trained on the platform?
questions.answer: Yes. Training is included with comprehensive documentation and hands-on sessions.
